title: Maouyome - Novel Updates
tags: Beautiful Female Lead   Childhood Friends   Fantasy World   Female Protagonist   Misunderstandings
author: Yoshifusa   由房
description:
On a certain day, our beautiful female lead, Lefiya, was brought to the Maou’s Palace against her will to become his bride.

She, with all her might, refused to marry the Maou, but what she didn't know was the identity of the Maou was in fact, her childhood friend who left her village five years ago.

Without knowing the true identity of the Maou due to a slight misunderstanding, a slapstick action love comedy ensues which tells the story of Lefiya who slowly but surely falls in love with the Hetare Maou.>
